TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Pn5180 extends Iot.Device.Card.CardTransceiver implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class Pn5180 Inherits CardTransceiver Implements IDisposable
type Pn5180 = class inherit CardTransceiver interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: A PN5180 class offering RFID and NFC functionalities. Implement the CardTransceiver class to allow Mifare, Credit Card support

Public Sub New (spiDevice As SpiDevice, pinBusy As Integer, pinNss As Integer, Optional gpioController As GpioController = Nothing, Optional shouldDispose As Boolean = true, Optional logLevel As LogLevel = Iot.Device.Card.LogLevel.None)

MemberSignature.Usage: new Iot.Device.Pn5180.Pn5180 (spiDevice, pinBusy, pinNss, gpioController, shouldDispose, logLevel)

Docs.param: The pin for the busy line
The pin for the SPI select line. This has to be handle differently than thru the normal process as PN5180 has a specific way of working
A GPIO controller, null will use a default one
Dispose the SPI and the GPIO controller at the end if true
Docs.summary: Create a PN5180 RFID/NFC reader

Docs.summary: Read data from a card.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SendDataToCard (Span<byte> toSend, int numberValidBitsLastByte = 8);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SendDataToCard(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> toSend, int32 numberValidBitsLastByte) cil managed
Public Function SendDataToCard (toSend As Span(Of Byte), Optional numberValidBitsLastByte As Integer = 8) As Boolean
member this.SendDataToCard : Span<byte> * int -> bool

Docs.param: The span of byte to send
The number of bits valid in the last byte, 8 is the default. If validBits == 3 then it's equivalent to apply a mask of 0b000_0111 to get the correct valid bits
Docs.summary: Send data to a card.
Docs.remarks: Using this function you'll have to manage yourself the possible low level communication protocol. This function write directly to the card all the bytes. Please make sure you'll first load specific radio frequence settings, detect a card, select it and then send data
